Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with excellence in mind. This product not only meets but exceeds industry standards, offering unparalleled performance and quality. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, we believe it's worth more than $150. However, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you to experience this remarkable product at a special price of $180. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your experience with our top-tier product. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
